import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import * as userActions from "../../redux/actions/userActions" import {bindActionCreators} from 'redux'; import Spin from '../hub/spinner' import AOS from 'aos' import 'aos/dist/aos.css'; import { Button, Card, CardBody, } from "reactstrap"; import { Form, Icon, Input, Item, notification } from "antd" import Illu from "../../assets/img/photos/invite.svg"; import { MinusCircleOutlined, PlusOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; const IntroInvite = (props) => {

Lets invite some people

Your Hub is your main control room. Target might name their Hub..Target

} export default IntroInvite
